title: Intervals where accum func is decreasing

content.question: On what intervals is g decreasing? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: On what intervals is g decreasing? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
